entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High plus 1.

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 19 February 2023
